amendment.description: An amendment numbered 9 printed in Part B of House Report 116-16 to require the Office of Government Ethics to submit a report to Congress regarding the implications of the retroactive application of the ethics waiver process.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Shalala amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A009) offered by Ms. Shalala.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Shalala amendment (A009) Agreed to by voice vote.
